title: Old Threats Persist For Loons On Lake Winnipesaukee
teaser: Sean Hurley of New Hampshire Public Radio went along on an annual bird count to find out how the loons are doing.
contentencoded:
Each year, members of New Hampshire’s Loon Preservation Committee count as many of the birds as they can find on Lake Winnipesaukee. From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Sean Hurley of New Hampshire Public Radio went along to find out how the loons are doing.

  • Read more on this story and see more photos via NHPR

Reporter

  • Sean Hurley, North County reporter for New Hampshire Public Radio. He tweetsÂ @Sherwinsleeves.
